issue.title: [C++] Zero-dependency default core build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6637](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6637). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a tracking JIRA for items relating to having few or no dependencies for minimal out-of-the-box builds

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6637?focusedCommentId=16938589) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
For the record, I just noticed we have a file `cpp/examples/minimal_build/build.sh` :-)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6637?focusedCommentId=16939040) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Yes, we should keep updating this file as we make progress on a simpler minimal build. That `build.sh` strikes me as a bit complicated to create a barebones build.
